titleStmt.title: Reasons offered by a well-wisher to the king and kingdom to some justices of the peace, met at the sessions in one of the northern shires, against addressing to the king with a petition for the sitting of the Parliament, January [...]6, 1679/80 / now published for the justification of all those loyal persons who opposed the petition in any parts of the nation.

Reasons offered by a well-wisher to the king and kingdom to some justices of the peace, met at the sessions in one of the northern shires, against addressing to the king with a petition for the sitting of the Parliament, January [...]6, 1679/80 / now published for the justification of all those loyal persons who opposed the petition in any parts of the nation.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Dated at end in manuscript: 4 Feb. 1679/80 [i.e. 1680]
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

person.persName: Well-wisher to the King and kingdom.
